A watch is a timepiece designed to be worn on the wrist, providing an convenient way to keep track of time. There are various types of watches, including analog, digital, and smartwatches, each offering unique features and functionalities. Analog watches display time through hour and minute hands, while digital watches show the time in numeric format. Smartwatches, on the other hand, offer a wide range of features such as fitness tracking, notification alerts, and mobile app integration.

Watches can be made from a variety of materials, including leather, metal, and plastic, and are often categorized based on their intended use, such as dress watches, sports watches, and diving watches. Some watches also feature additional complications, like date and day displays, chronographs, and alarm functions.
